content:
When using the profile http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/StructureDefinition/plannet-Organization and attempting to perform a $validate, I get an error saying "Unknown Code System 'http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/CodeSystem/OrgTypeCS'". I am using the ACME example here: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-pdex-plan-net/Organization-Acme.json.html
I am using http://hapi.fhir.org/baseR4 as the server. Does anyone know why this is happening? Also is there a "right" place to put taxonomy codes in an Organization resource? Adding a "qualification" gives an error and adding it to identifier gets a warning. /cc @Corey Spears
I tried validating in the Inferno Validator and it works fine. Does using $validate on other profiles work for http://hapi.fhir.org/baseR4
